input_text:
Job Title: Vice President of Sales

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About PostPilotWe are the #1 direct mail platform for ecommerce and one of the fastest-growing companies in the U.S. Our goal is to help big direct-to-consumer (DTC) brands unlock this profitable channel for acquiring, retargeting and retaining customers. We are a remote-first team and have multiple print facilities in the U.S. and globally to ensure that our customers get the most consistent, high-quality print products possible.
About the RoleWe are looking for a VP of Sales. Founder-led sales has grown our bootstrapped company 20X in under three years. We now are ready for a sales leader to create a repeatable machine that targets opportunities and engages and monetizes them. 
ResponsibilitiesFeed the engine. PostPilot is already growing; we want more predictable growth that doesn’t plateau going forward. You will put the systems and people in place to take what has worked with 2 AEs and 2 Founders and make it work for 10+. Revops. You will drive down the sales cycle by talking with customers, learning how they think, then institutionalizing proper sales tactics and pitch scripts that close faster.Go upmarket. We are. We could use someone to own the unique nature of larger customer deals: higher ACVs, multiple-call closes, multiple parties at the brand making decisions, negotiating legal terms, etc. Recruiting. You will be able to recruit great reps and SDRs and train them to be successful. 
QualificationsLeadership. You’ve run a sales team. You’ll know a handful of AEs and SDRs you’d bring with you tomorrow if we needed them. (And they’d want to follow you.)Experience. You’ve sold and negotiated 20-50K ACV deals, up-front payments, inbound and outbound.Ecommerce experience is a plus. Not required, but experience in the Shopify ecosystem would help. 
CompensationWe pay 50/50/25+, the "Lemkin Special", which means:50% of OTE paid as base salary. No draw.50% of OTE paid as a bonus, with the target being the overall company revenue number for the year. 25% or more upside for exceeding that plan.

Experience Level (if available): None
